byline.original: By ALAN WONG and MICHAEL FORSYTHE

abstract: Hong Kong judge finds Joshua Wong, Alex Chow and Nathan Law guilty on charges related to their roles in student-led demonstrations in 2014; verdicts are first convictions of leaders of protest known as Umbrella Movement.

headline.print_headline: 3 Convicted Over Rallies in Hong Kong
headline.main: Joshua Wong and 2 Others Convicted Over Their Roles in Hong Kong Protests

snippet: Three leaders of the demonstrations in 2014 for freer elections in the self-governing Chinese city are to be sentenced next month....
lead_paragraph: Three leaders of the demonstrations in 2014 for freer elections in the self-governing Chinese city are to be sentenced next month.
